Parameter.name: box
Parameter.description: description of the box
Parameter.possible_values: NO; FRAC_2D; FRAC_2D_FLOW; FRAC_3D; FRAC_3D_FLOW; MSFRAC; GRID; POROUS; POROUS_TRACKER

Parameter.name: function
Parameter.description: with FRAC2D : NETWORK_2D, NETWORK_2D1, NETWORK_2D2 ************************************************************** with FRAC_2D_FLOW : FLOW_2D, FLOW_2D1, FLOW_2D2, HEAD_2D, HEAD_2D1, HEAD_2D2, Ht, Ht_scale, Ht_simple, Ht_double, Tr, Tr_simple, Tr_double ************************************************************** with FRAC3D : NETWORK_3D, FLOW_3D, MESHING_3D, HEAD_3D, PROJECTION_3D, DISCRETIZATION_3D, HULL_3D, FLOW2D_3D, MESHING2D_3D, PERM_3D **************************************************************** with MSFRAC : MULTI_NETWORK, MULTI_MODIFIED, MULTI_CONNECTED, MULTI_ADDED ************************************************************** with GRID : MAPFRAC_2D, MAPFRACFLOW_2D, FLOWBORDER0, FLOWBORDER1, FLOWBORDER2, MAPALPHA, KPROJ, KPERM, KPERMMEAN, KCLUSTER ************************************************************** with POROUS : POROUS_GRID_K, POROUS_GRID_H, POROUS_GRID_Ht POROUS_GRID_VNORM , POROUS_GRID_VX, POROUS_GRID_VY, POROUS_GRID_VZ, POROUS_GRID_K_PIEZOS ************************************************************** with POROUS_TRACKER : POROUS_GRID_RW, POROUS_GRID_RW_GRID
Parameter.possible_values: NO; NETWORK_2D; NETWORK_2D1; NETWORK_2D2 ; FLOW_2D; FLOW_2D1; FLOW_2D2; HEAD_2D; HEAD_2D1; HEAD_2D2; Ht; Ht_scale; Ht_simple; Ht_double; Tr; Tr_simple; Tr_double; NETWORK_3D; FLOW_3D; MESHING_3D; HEAD_3D; PROJECTION_3D; DISCRETIZATION_3D; HULL_3D; FLOW2D_3D; MESHING2D_3D; PERM_3D; MULTI_NETWORK; MULTI_MODIFIED; MULTI_CONNECTED; MULTI_ADDED; MAPFRAC_2D; MAPFRACFLOW_2D; FLOWBORDER0; FLOWBORDER1; FLOWBORDER2; MAPALPHA; KPROJ; KPERM; KPERMMEAN; KCLUSTER; POROUS_GRID_K; POROUS_GRID_H; POROUS_GRID_Ht; POROUS_GRID_VNORM; POROUS_GRID_VX; POROUS_GRID_VY; POROUS_GRID_VZ; POROUS_GRID_K_PIEZOS; POROUS_GRID_RW; POROUS_GRID_RW_GRID

Parameter.name: continue
Parameter.description: indicates to continue after already performed simulations, until simulations_number be achieved ; if activated, continue_directory must be indicated

Parameter.name: continue_directory
Parameter.description: name of the results directory where to continue

Parameter.name: parallel_simulations_number
Parameter.description: if > 1, indicates the number of parallel simulations to realize at the same time

Parameter.name: simulations_number
Parameter.description: total number of wanted simulations

Parameter.name: visu_test
Parameter.description: if activated, the visualisation of the last simulation is launched

Parameter.name: nb_to_skip
Parameter.description: Number of substreams to skip when random_type=RANDOM_PARTIAL is activated

Parameter.name: random_type
Parameter.description: Type of method for sampling the stochastic parameter space
Parameter.possible_values: RANDOM_ALL: all seeds are modified for each simulation; RANDOM_PARTIAL: some of the seeds are fixed for all simulations

Parameter.name: substreams_variable
Parameter.description: (,)+(,) List of fixed seeds, only effective it random_type=RANDOM_PARTIAL

Parameter.name: load_display
Parameter.description: if opengl_display is activated then load_display specifies if the screen organisation is loaded from parameters or taken by default

Parameter.name: opengl_display
Parameter.description: activate or desactivate opengl display

Parameter.name: opengl_display_limited_time
Parameter.description: display for a limited number of seconds

Parameter.name: opengl_in_file
Parameter.description: if activated, the visualisation is put into a file instead of the screen

Parameter.name: directory_date
Parameter.description: activation of date in the root_results_directory
Parameter.possible_values: 0: no date in directory name; 1: date in directory name

Parameter.name: directory_prefix
Parameter.description: prefix string of the output results directory

Parameter.name: recording_format
Parameter.description: format of output files recording

Parameter.name: root_results_directory
Parameter.description: root folder for output files (relative path from HYDROLAB_ROOT, or DEFAULT_SIMPLE_RUN for /runs/prog_name/simple_runs/results)

Parameter.name: nb_to_skip
Parameter.description: number of simulations to skip

Parameter.name: boundary_condition_description
Parameter.description: parameter group used to describe boundary conditions

Parameter.name: boundary_condition_position
Parameter.description: head boundary conditions will be applied at the node or at the border of the border meshes

Parameter.name: dhdn_or_velocity_imposed
Parameter.description: if dh/dn imposed, equation is alpha*h + beta*dh/dn = gamma ; if velocity imposed equation is alpha*h + beta*K*dh/dn = gamma

Parameter.name: perturbation
Parameter.description: add noise to boundary conditions

Parameter.name: perturbation_amplitude
Parameter.description: amplitude of the noise

Parameter.name: rotation
Parameter.description: apply a rotation to the given boundary conditions?

Parameter.name: rotation_angle
Parameter.description: rotation angle

Parameter.name: manual_flow
Parameter.description: Values for imposed flow (values separated by # or VOID)

Parameter.name: manual_flow_length
Parameter.description: Lengths of the flow wells (values separated by # or VOID ; put 0 for a well in only 1 cell)

Parameter.name: manual_flow_top_location
Parameter.description: Coordinates locations of wells at imposed flow ([x,y,z] separated by # or VOID)

Parameter.name: manual_head
Parameter.description: Values for imposed head (values separated by # or VOID)

Parameter.name: manual_head_length
Parameter.description: Lengths of the head wells (values separated by # or VOID ; put 0 for a well in only 1 cell)

Parameter.name: manual_head_top_location
Parameter.description: Coordinates locations of wells at imposed head ([x,y,z] separated by # or VOID)

Parameter.name: manual_history
Parameter.description: History of source and sink flows ([,,] separated by # or VOID)

Parameter.name: source_file_path
Parameter.description: If !NO_FILE, reads the file containing wells information : positions (x, y, z) then type (flow or head) and then the value of the well

Parameter.name: alpha1
Parameter.description: no_description

Parameter.name: alpha2
Parameter.description: no_description

Parameter.name: beta1
Parameter.description: no_description

Parameter.name: beta2
Parameter.description: no_description

Parameter.name: boundary_conditions_type
Parameter.description: boundary type: (0) fixed head (h_max and h_min) on the borders perpendicular to flow_direction and flow=0 on the other borders, (1) alpha1*h+beta1(*K)*dh/dn=gamma1 and alpha2*h+beta2(*K)*dh/dn=gamma2 on the borders perpendicular to flow_direction and flow=0 on the other borders, (2) fixed head (h_max and h_min) on the borders perpendicular to flow_direction and fixed head which evolves lineraly on the other borders, (3) fixed head (h_max) on all the borders, (4) aquifer type boundary conditions with flow_imposed on borders X- and Y-, gradient from h_max to h_min on borders X+ and Y+
Parameter.possible_values: 0: permeameter_classic; 1: permeameter_robin; 2: gradient; 3: well; 4: aquifer_bc; 5: permeameter with boundary conditions periodic in the other directions; 6: head boundary conditions imposed inside the domain

Parameter.name: flow_direction
Parameter.description: flow direction

Parameter.name: flow_imposed
Parameter.description: value for dh/dn or velocity imposed

Parameter.name: gamma1
Parameter.description: no_description

Parameter.name: gamma2
Parameter.description: no_description

Parameter.name: h_max
Parameter.description: maximum head value, generally computed inside the code

Parameter.name: h_min
Parameter.description: minimum head value

Parameter.name: type_location
Parameter.description: type of locations of sink and source terms (VOID if not any)
Parameter.possible_values: VOID; CENTER; DIPOLE; TRIPOLE; QUADRUPOLE; MANUAL

Parameter.name: manual_flow
Parameter.description: Values for imposed flow (values separated by # or VOID)

Parameter.name: manual_flow_length
Parameter.description: Lengths of the flow wells (values separated by # or VOID ; put 0 for a well in only 1 cell)

Parameter.name: manual_flow_top_location
Parameter.description: Coordinates locations of wells at imposed flow ([x,y,z] separated by # or VOID)

Parameter.name: manual_head
Parameter.description: Values for imposed head (values separated by # or VOID)

Parameter.name: manual_head_length
Parameter.description: Lengths of the head wells (values separated by # or VOID ; put 0 for a well in only 1 cell)

Parameter.name: manual_head_top_location
Parameter.description: Coordinates locations of wells at imposed head ([x,y,z] separated by # or VOID)

Parameter.name: manual_history
Parameter.description: History of source and sink flows ([,,] separated by # or VOID)

Parameter.name: source_file_path
Parameter.description: If !NO_FILE, reads the file containing wells information : positions (x, y, z) then type (flow or head) and then the value of the well

Parameter.name: npole_scale_absolute
Parameter.description: characteristic scale between poles in absolute terms

Parameter.name: npole_scale_flows
Parameter.description: list of flows on npoles

Parameter.name: npole_scale_relative
Parameter.description: characteristic scale between poles in relative terms (in percent)

Parameter.name: npole_scale_type
Parameter.description: type of computation of the characteristic scale

Parameter.name: n_time_skip
Parameter.description: Number of skipped step between the pulse and the first recorded step

Parameter.name: pulse_duration
Parameter.description: Pulse duration. If pulse duration > Initial time, reduction of pulse duration such that it is 1/pulse_duration times smaller

Parameter.name: type_history
Parameter.description: type of time signature of sink and source terms

Parameter.name: flow_line_width
Parameter.description: percentage of flow to discriminate flow lines

Parameter.name: color
Parameter.description: activation or not of the color to draw fractures

Parameter.name: color_exp
Parameter.description: exponent of the power law giving the channel grey intensity from the flow value

Parameter.name: color_min
Parameter.description: minimum grey intensity for channel flow visualisation

Parameter.name: lin_log
Parameter.description: type of color scale

Parameter.name: width_exp
Parameter.description: exponent of the power law giving the channel thickness from the aperture value

Parameter.name: width_max
Parameter.description: maximum width for channel flow visualisation

Parameter.name: width_min
Parameter.description: minimum width for channel flow visualisation

Parameter.name: closure_global
Parameter.description: Relative error on sum of fluxes on the domain boundaries

Parameter.name: computation_method
Parameter.description: method used to compute the flow

Parameter.name: identity_extraction
Parameter.description: option available only in sequential: if an identity matrix is present within the linear system matrix, extract it before solving and keep the associated Dirichlet BC
Parameter.possible_values: 0: no extraction; 1: extract the identity matrix before solving

Parameter.name: iter_max
Parameter.description: maximum number of iterations (for iterative solver only)

Parameter.name: linear_solver
Parameter.description: linear solver to use
Parameter.possible_values: 0:PETSC; 1:UMFPACK; 2:PSPASES; 3:HypreBoomerAMG; 4:HypreSMG; 5:HyprePCG precond by BOOMERAMG; 6:MUMPS; 7:HypreGMRES precond by Euclid; 8:HypreBiCGSTAB precond by Euclid

Parameter.name: save_K
Parameter.description: Whether to save the permeability or not

Parameter.name: save_matrix
Parameter.description: Whether to save the system or not
Parameter.possible_values: 0: Do not save the system's matrix; 1: Save the system's matrix

Parameter.name: save_p
Parameter.description: Whether to save the mean head or not

Parameter.name: scaling
Parameter.description: say if scaling of the linear system is active or not

Parameter.name: screen
Parameter.description: no_description

Parameter.name: solver_precision
Parameter.description: precision parameters for the solver, if relevant.

Parameter.name: sparse_nummering
Parameter.description: sparse nummering of the system for lacunary structures

Parameter.name: update_precision
Parameter.description: option available only if identity_extraction is not active: if an identity matrix is present within the linear system matrix, rescale solver_precision according to the norms of Dirichlet BC vs the remaining terms in the second member

Parameter.name: nb_steady_states
Parameter.description: Number of steady states

Parameter.name: parameters_affectation
Parameter.description: Affect parameters and value to each state S1=P1/V1*Pi/Vj*Pn/Vn#S2=...

Parameter.name: parameters_list
Parameter.description: List of parameters to modify for all steady states P1="parameter name"#P2 = "parameter name 2"

Parameter.name: time_limits_list
Parameter.description: List of periods of steady states T1 ="period 1"#T2="period 2"

Parameter.name: values_list
Parameter.description: List of parameters value for all steady states V1="parameter value"#V2 = "parameter name 2"

Parameter.name: part1_definition
Parameter.description: type of construction in part 1; REGULAR_: constant step; GEOMETRIC_: step starts from D1 and is incremented by a constant multiplication factor F1 (when L1 is imposed, F1 is computed to match L1)
Parameter.possible_values: 0: REGULAR_N1_D1; 1: REGULAR_N1_L1; 2: REGULAR_D1_L1; 3: GEOMETRIC_D1_N1_F1; 4: GEOMETRIC_D1_N1_L1; 5: GEOMETRIC_D1_F1_L1

Parameter.name: part2_definition
Parameter.description: type of construction in part 2; REGULAR_: constant step; GEOMETRIC_: step starts from step in part 1 and is incremented by a constant multiplication factor F2 (when L2 is imposed, F2 is computed to match L2)
Parameter.possible_values: 0: REGULAR_N2_D2; 1: REGULAR_N2_L2; 2: REGULAR_D2_L2; 3: GEOMETRIC_N2_F2; 4: GEOMETRIC_N2_L2; 5: GEOMETRIC_F2_L2

Parameter.name: part2_down
Parameter.description: if activated, construction of lines of part2 goes down starting from the first line of part1

Parameter.name: border_mesh_half
Parameter.description: if activated, the borders meshes are cut half

Parameter.name: size_definition
Parameter.description: indicates which parameters to take to define the grid
Parameter.possible_values: 0: Nx, Ny, Nz, Dx, Dy, Dz; 1: Nx, Ny, Nz, Lx, Ly, Lz; 2: Dx, Dy, Dz, Lx, Ly, Lz

Parameter.name: add_fracture
Parameter.description: activate or deactivate the addition of fracture over the field already generated (fracture is defined in fracture group)

Parameter.name: add_lense
Parameter.description: activate or deactivate the addition of lense over the field already generated (lense is defined in lense groups)

Parameter.name: field_type
Parameter.description: Type of field in terms of structure. ParametersGroup distribution is required for the three first options.
Parameter.possible_values: NO_CORRELATION:random non correlated field; CORRELATION:MultiGaussian correlated field; STRATIFICATION:Stratified field; STRUCTURE:Block structured field; FRACTAL:fractal and multifractal correlations; FILE:enter field from a file; INCLUSIONS:inclusions in an homogeneous field

Parameter.name: large_generation
Parameter.description: generates the permeability field in a 10 times larger grid to avoid border effects

Parameter.name: correlation_type
Parameter.description: type of correlation function

Parameter.name: generation_type
Parameter.description: REAL_SPACE: generates the correlation function, discretizes it and fourier transfrom it, FOURIER_SPACE: direct generation in fourier space

Parameter.name: periodic
Parameter.description: 1: Generation of a periodic correlation domain

Parameter.name: isotropy
Parameter.description: isotropy or anisotropy

Parameter.name: lambda_x
Parameter.description: correlation length in direction x

Parameter.name: lambda_y
Parameter.description: correlation length in direction y

Parameter.name: lambda_z
Parameter.description: correlation length in direction z

Parameter.name: lambda
Parameter.description: correlation length

Parameter.name: isotropy
Parameter.description: isotropy or anisotropy

Parameter.name: modification
Parameter.description: Modification of the correlation pattern in order to correlate more the larger values (PLUS), the smaller values (MINUS), to add fractures along the main flow direction (x) connecting the borders (F2) or not connecting the borders (F)

Parameter.name: fraction_sizex
Parameter.description: length of fracture to be added: Lx/(fraction_sizex)

Parameter.name: nb
Parameter.description: number of fractures to be added

Parameter.name: lambda_x
Parameter.description: correlation length in direction x

Parameter.name: lambda_y
Parameter.description: correlation length in direction y

Parameter.name: lambda_z
Parameter.description: correlation length in direction z

Parameter.name: lambda
Parameter.description: correlation length

Parameter.name: beta
Parameter.description: beta

Parameter.name: cutoff
Parameter.description: cutoff length, 0<val<system size

Parameter.name: power
Parameter.description: power

Parameter.name: distribution_type
Parameter.description: Type of value distribution. Each distribution is given a ParametersGroup for its parameters.
Parameter.possible_values: HOMO:constant; BINARY:binary distribution; UNIFORM:uniform distribution; NORMAL:Gaussian distribution; LOGNORMAL:Lognormal distribution; LOGUNIFORM:Loguniform distribution

Parameter.name: val1
Parameter.description: first value of the binary field

Parameter.name: val2
Parameter.description: second value of the binary field

Parameter.name: val
Parameter.description: Value of the homogeneous field

Parameter.name: lognormal_mean
Parameter.description: log-mean of the lognormal distribution

Parameter.name: lognormal_std
Parameter.description: lof-standard deviation of the lognormal distribution

Parameter.name: log_max
Parameter.description: log of ghe maximum of the loguniform distribution

Parameter.name: log_min
Parameter.description: log of ghe minimum of the loguniform distribution. Internal check that max > min

Parameter.name: mean
Parameter.description: mean of the normal distribution

Parameter.name: std
Parameter.description: standard deviation of the normal distribution

Parameter.name: val_max
Parameter.description: maximum value of the uniform distribution

Parameter.name: val_min
Parameter.description: minimum value of the uniform distribution. Internal check that max > min

Parameter.name: column_name
Parameter.description: Name of the column to load, such as permeability, K1, porosity, velocity_x1, vz...

Parameter.name: file_path
Parameter.description: file path to get core values

Parameter.name: file_type
Parameter.description: type of file

Parameter.name: ref_file_path
Parameter.description: file path to get information about external values

Parameter.name: aperture
Parameter.description: size of the aperture of the fracture (centered at the plan)

Parameter.name: dip_angle
Parameter.description: angle (in degree) between the fracture plan and the horizontal plan

Parameter.name: point_on_frac
Parameter.description: point on the fracture plan

Parameter.name: strike_angle
Parameter.description: angle (in degree) between the fracture plan and the x axis

Parameter.name: val_fracture
Parameter.description: value within the fracture

Parameter.name: K_background
Parameter.description: background permeability

Parameter.name: K_inclusions
Parameter.description: inclusions permeability

Parameter.name: lag_x
Parameter.description: characteristic distance between inclusions along x

Parameter.name: lag_y
Parameter.description: characteristic distance of the inclusions along y

Parameter.name: shape
Parameter.description: shape of the inclusions

Parameter.name: shift_x
Parameter.description: characteristic shift between inclusions along x

Parameter.name: shift_y
Parameter.description: characteristic shift of the inclusions along y

Parameter.name: size_x
Parameter.description: characteristic size of the inclusions along x

Parameter.name: size_y
Parameter.description: characteristic size of the inclusions along y

Parameter.name: multiplication_factor
Parameter.description: Multiplication factor in terms of system size

Parameter.name: position_lense
Parameter.description: point on the fracture plan; for several, separate with #

Parameter.name: size_lense
Parameter.description: size of the aperture of the fracture (centered at the plan); for several, separate with #

Parameter.name: val_lense
Parameter.description: value within the fracture; for several, separate with #

Parameter.name: analyses
Parameter.description: Type of geometrical characteristics computed on the field (classtats : neologism for classical stats <=>moments, min, max, standard deviation)
Parameter.possible_values: none; classtats; corr_length; cs4; s2_scaled; s2; cf1k; cf2k

Parameter.name: analyses_scale
Parameter.description: Scale with which the permeability field is analyzed

Parameter.name: outputs
Parameter.description: Additional large outputs like no outputs, outputs in its own file (single) or ouputs in a general file (heap)

Parameter.name: outputs_format
Parameter.description: Different output formats
Parameter.possible_values: classic; gocad; vtk; vtk_flow_line:vtk with particle number

Parameter.name: distribution_type
Parameter.description: distribution of values in the strates
Parameter.possible_values: DEFAULT:the distribution defined before; STRAT_NB:the index of the row (if HORIZONTAL) or column (if VERTICAL) or processor (if PROC)

Parameter.name: stratification_type
Parameter.description: type of stratification
Parameter.possible_values: HORIZONTAL:use distribution_type parameter for each row; VERTICAL:use distribution_type parameter for each column; PROC:use distribution_type parameter for each processor; ANNULAR:use annular parameters group; ZONES2:use zones2 parameters group; FRACTURE_HORIZONTAL:use fracture_horizontal parameters group; PARABOLIC:see source code

Parameter.name: exponent
Parameter.description: exponent of the power dependence towards the center

Parameter.name: val_fracture
Parameter.description: value within the fracture

Parameter.name: val_matrix
Parameter.description: value within the matrix

Parameter.name: direction
Parameter.description: direction in which the property varies
Parameter.possible_values: 0: X axis; 1: Y axi; 2: Z axis

Parameter.name: val_down
Parameter.description: value on the lower side

Parameter.name: val_down_definition
Parameter.description: to know which parameter defines the value on the lower side
Parameter.possible_values: VAL_DOWN: use val_down; RATIO: use val_down_ratio; EXPONENTIAL: use val_down_exponential

Parameter.name: val_down_exponential
Parameter.description: values in the lower side are defined by val_up*exp(-d/val_down_exponential), where d is the distance to the separation function

Parameter.name: val_down_ratio
Parameter.description: ratio that multiplies val_up to define the value in the lower side

Parameter.name: val_up
Parameter.description: value in the upper side

Parameter.name: separation_type
Parameter.description: topography of the separation between the 2 zones
Parameter.possible_values: CONST_MIDDLE: middle of the domain; LINEAR: use a 1D linear function along the X axis; FILE: load the separation function from a file

Parameter.name: file_path
Parameter.description: path of the topography file ; format is 1st column is i, 2nd column is k and 3rd column is topo

Parameter.name: file_type
Parameter.description: format of the topography file
Parameter.possible_values: BASIC: i k value; GRD: .grd file

Parameter.name: scale_factor
Parameter.description: factor to multiply the separation read in file (after shifting)

Parameter.name: shift
Parameter.description: shift the separation read in file, real [L]

Parameter.name: a
Parameter.description: y0+a*x

Parameter.name: y0
Parameter.description: y0+a*x

Parameter.name: Vijk
Parameter.description: values in blocs, ordered by a loop on Z blocs inside a loop on Y blocs inside a loop on X blocs; V1*V2*...*Vnv with nv = (nx+1)*(ny+1)*(nz+1)

Parameter.name: X_limits
Parameter.description: limits between blocs in X direction; X1*X2*...*Xnx in Xdirection

Parameter.name: Y_limits
Parameter.description: limits between blocs in Y direction; Y1*Y2*...*Yny in Ydirection

Parameter.name: Z_limits
Parameter.description: limits between blocs in Z direction; Z1*Z2*...*Znz in Z direction

Parameter.name: file_type
Parameter.description: Type of data file used to save head field

Parameter.name: ref_file_path
Parameter.description: Reference file for gocad type

Parameter.name: analyses
Parameter.description: Type of characteristics computed on the head field

Parameter.name: analyses_scale
Parameter.description: Scale with which the head field is analyzed and saved : linear (lin), logarithmic (log)

Parameter.name: outputs
Parameter.description: Activates (1) or desactivates (0) the outputs of head field

Parameter.name: outputs_format
Parameter.description: Format of outputs (including headings format). For classic format, headings are the variables names

Parameter.name: GENERATION
Parameter.description: no_description

Parameter.name: aquifer_condition
Parameter.description: Flow computation is performed under confined (0) or unconfined (1) conditions. Under unconfined conditions, flow computation is performed with a free surface algorithm.

Parameter.name: backward_time
Parameter.description: Activates (1) or desactivates (0) the resolution of transport in backward time

Parameter.name: display_screen
Parameter.description: Different degrees of messages display: no message (0), just advancement (1)

Parameter.name: flow
Parameter.description: Activates (1) or desactivates (0) the simulation of flow

Parameter.name: flow_obtention
Parameter.description: Internal COMPUTATION of flow from permeability field or GENERATION of flow from the grid_property input file corresponding

Parameter.name: flow_state
Parameter.description: Choice of the flow simulation : steady (0), transient (1), quasi-steady for temporal fluctuation studies (2), semi-transient (3)

Parameter.name: transport
Parameter.description: Activates (1) or desactivates (0) the simulation of transport (Tracker method)

Parameter.name: wb_computation
Parameter.description: Activates (1) or desactivates (0) the computation of the water budget (between zones and with limits). CAUTION : zones obtention must be different of NO

Parameter.name: zones_obtention
Parameter.description: NO obtention, internal COMPUTATION or READING from a file of permeability zones

Parameter.name: column_name
Parameter.description: Name of the column to extract from the data file in file_path

Parameter.name: file_path
Parameter.description: File path to get data

Parameter.name: file_type
Parameter.description: Type of data file used to read and save permeability zones

Parameter.name: ref_file_path
Parameter.description: Reference file for gocad type to read and save permeability zones

Parameter.name: analyses_scale
Parameter.description: Scale with which the zone field is analyzed and saved : linear (lin), logarithmic (log)

Parameter.name: outputs
Parameter.description: Activates (1) or desactivates (0) the outputs of permeability zones

Parameter.name: outputs_format
Parameter.description: Format of outputs (including headings format). For classic format, headings are the variables names

Parameter.name: correlation_coefficient
Parameter.description: Correlation coefficient between the main flow direction and the secondary flow directions

Parameter.name: amplitude
Parameter.description: amplitude of the perturbation (amplitude of the square or std of the random distribution)

Parameter.name: correlation
Parameter.description: correlation time of the fluctuations (correlation length or length of the square)

Parameter.name: discretization
Parameter.description: Number of discretization steps of the correlation length

Parameter.name: fixed_component
Parameter.description: fixed component to which will be added the fluctuations

Parameter.name: type
Parameter.description: type of temporal correlation

Parameter.name: amplitude
Parameter.description: amplitude of the perturbation (amplitude of the square or std of the random distribution)

Parameter.name: correlation
Parameter.description: correlation time of the fluctuations (correlation length or length of the square)

Parameter.name: discretization
Parameter.description: Number of discretization steps of the correlation length

Parameter.name: fixed_component
Parameter.description: fixed component to which will be added the fluctuations

Parameter.name: type
Parameter.description: type of correlation

Parameter.name: GENERATION
Parameter.description: Random Number for the generation of time fluctuations

Parameter.name: analysis_and_outputs
Parameter.description: Categories of results to fill and output separated by #: tracker_vectors, tracker_distributions, tracker_concentrations, tracker_concentrations_correlation, tracker_asymptotic, tracker_channeling, tracker_paths, , tracker_paths, tracker_lagrangian_correlation_time, tracker_lagrangian_correlation_space

Parameter.name: method_type
Parameter.description: Type of method used for the random walk computation: Continuous Time Random Walk (0), Discrete Time Random Walk (1)

Parameter.name: nb_step_by_mesh
Parameter.description: Average number of steps taken by a particle within a single mesh

Parameter.name: parallel_communication_type
Parameter.description: Communication type between processors: Cascade (0), Pairwise (1)

Parameter.name: particle_storage
Parameter.description: Activates (1) or desactivates (0) the storage of characteristics of particles path

Parameter.name: particle_type
Parameter.description: Type of particle: LV=Lagrangian volume, RW=Random Walk, RW_history=Random Walk with history about path

Parameter.name: path_format
Parameter.description: Format of the output of particles paths: none=does not export particles path, gocad=export for reading in gocad, gocad_geo=export for reading in gocad with a georeferenced system detailed in ref_file, vtk=export for reading in vtk

Parameter.name: ref_file
Parameter.description: Reference file for output of particles paths in case of gocad_geo

Parameter.name: tracker_paths_options
Parameter.description: Indicates options for tracker_paths results to store for each particle: travel_time, partial_travel_time, injection_zone_id, injection_position, exit_position, extrema_position (in each direction, the maximum and minimum point reached along the path)

Parameter.name: display_type
Parameter.description: Display with tabulations as separators (0) or with fixed width (1)

Parameter.name: injector
Parameter.description: Displays the injection of particles (1) or not (0)

Parameter.name: particle_movements
Parameter.description: Displays the evolving positions of the particles: no display (0), display only particles (1) or display particles and meshes (2)

Parameter.name: active
Parameter.description: Activate injection restricted to a limited number of particles (1) or not (0)

Parameter.name: no
Parameter.description: Character string with the number of particles to run separated by the # character

Parameter.name: INPUT_POSITION
Parameter.description: Seeds for the input positions of the Walkers

Parameter.name: TRACKER
Parameter.description: Random number for particle tracking (diffusion-dispersion)

Parameter.name: injection_concentrations
Parameter.description: History of injected concentrations. Form is : C1=1*C1=0.5*..*Cn=Value n

Parameter.name: injection_stage_number
Parameter.description: Number of injection stages (number of particles injected at each stage = number of particles / number of stages)

Parameter.name: particles_number
Parameter.description: Number of particles

Parameter.name: stop
Parameter.description: Stops the particles tracking when the fastest particle leaves the domain (1) or tracks the particles until all particles have left the system (0)

Parameter.name: injection_graph
Parameter.description: Composition of injection parameters : spatial*temporal*concentration, such as Z1*T1*C1#Z2*T1*C1#Z2*T2*C2, X_LOW*DIRAC*C1, X_LOW*DIRAC*C1#Y_HIGH*DIRAC*C1

Parameter.name: injection_type
Parameter.description: Types of injection: Random in Window (0), Random in Mesh Vertical (1), Deterministic (2), at Meshing Center (3), From Fixed Positions (4), Random in Mesh (5),

Parameter.name: side_zone
Parameter.description: side zone along the sides

Parameter.name: simple_or_flow
Parameter.description: Injection is proportional to zone's volume (0) or proportional to zone's volume * flow (1)

Parameter.name: volume_or_contour
Parameter.description: Injected is done into the whole volume (0) or in the contour (1) of the injection zone

Parameter.name: nb_X
Parameter.description: Number of elements along X for regular repartition, for each zone of the injection graph; USED WHEN simple_or_flow=0

Parameter.name: nb_Y
Parameter.description: Number of elements along Y for regular repartition, for each zone of the injection graph such as nb_Y or nb_Y_zone1#nb_Y_zone2; USED WHEN simple_or_flow=0

Parameter.name: nb_Z
Parameter.description: Number of elements along Z for regular repartition, for each zone of the injection graph such as nb_Z or nb_Z_zone1#nb_Z_zone2; USED WHEN simple_or_flow=0

Parameter.name: nb_tot
Parameter.description: Total number of elements to inject for each zone of the injection graph such as nb_tot or nb_tot_zone1#nb_tot_zone2 such as nb_X or nb_X_zone1#nb_X_zone2...; USED WHEN simple_or_flow=1

Parameter.name: spatial_border
Parameter.description: Input border such as X_LOW, Y_HIGH, X_LOW#Y_HIGH

Parameter.name: spatial_manual
Parameter.description: input zones : Z1 = xmin/ymin/zmin*xmax/ymax/zmax

Parameter.name: spatial_window
Parameter.description: proportion of the system size

Parameter.name: zone_spatial_auto
Parameter.description: Type of automatically generated injection zone

Parameter.name: zone_spatial_type
Parameter.description: Injection domain defined in proportion of the system size, defined from positions or in meshes number. PROPORTION, POSITION and MESH_BORDERS_ENGLOBING_POSITION are implemented for MANUAL, PROPORTION and MESH are implemented for WINDOW

Parameter.name: time_interval_auto
Parameter.description: Type of automatically generated injection time

Parameter.name: time_manual
Parameter.description: Time interval for manual temporal injection

Parameter.name: pure_advection
Parameter.description: Activates (1) or desactivates (0) pure advection, infinite Peclet number in case of pure advection

Parameter.name: diffusion_coeff_computation
Parameter.description: Choice of the way to determine molecular diffusion coefficient : directly (0) or via Peclet number (1)

Parameter.name: diffusion_coefficient
Parameter.description: Diffusion coefficient (units: length^2/time)

Parameter.name: peclet_number
Parameter.description: Peclet number

Parameter.name: alpha_longitudinal
Parameter.description: Longitudinal dispersivity (along axis x)

Parameter.name: alpha_transversaly
Parameter.description: Transversal dispersivity (along axis y)

Parameter.name: alpha_transversalz
Parameter.description: Transversal dispersivity (along axis z)

Parameter.name: discontinuity_correction
Parameter.description: Treatment of the particles transfer across a discontinuity: no correction (0), drift term (1), Hoteit reflection-2002 (2), Hoteit reflection and drift term (3)

Parameter.name: hydrodynamic_dispersion
Parameter.description: Activates (1) or desactivates (0) hydrodynamic dispersion

Parameter.name: mesh_storage
Parameter.description: Keep in memory mesh structure for display purposes: keep (0), remove (1)

Parameter.name: stat_storage
Parameter.description: Activates (1) or desactivates (0) storage of statistics

Parameter.name: it
Parameter.description: Concentration will be output each it*nt step (it is given in % of the maximum index)

Parameter.name: NRW
Parameter.description: Number of particles on which will be performed the concentration correlation

Parameter.name: it
Parameter.description: Correlations will be computed each it*nt step (it is given in % of the maximum index)

Parameter.name: limited_NRW
Parameter.description: Limits the number of particles on which will be performed the correlation analysis

Parameter.name: nr
Parameter.description: Number of radii for the discretization of the correlation function

Parameter.name: rmax
Parameter.description: Maximal distance at which the correlation function will be computed

Parameter.name: rmax_reference
Parameter.description: Type of reference used for the computation of rmax: real distance (0), 1% of the maximal size (1)

Parameter.name: rmin
Parameter.description: Minimal distance at which the correlation function will be computed

Parameter.name: rmin_reference
Parameter.description: Type of reference used for the computation of rmin: real distance (0), 1% of the maximal size (1)

Parameter.name: scale_c
Parameter.description: Type of sampling scale : linear (0), logarithmic (1)

Parameter.name: coeff_vmax
Parameter.description: coefficient for estimating vmax

Parameter.name: coeff_vmin
Parameter.description: coefficient for estimating vmin

Parameter.name: nb_k
Parameter.description: Number of time or space steps in sampling

Parameter.name: nv
Parameter.description: Number of classes on sampling scale

Parameter.name: reference_vmax_storage
Parameter.description: Estimation of maximum value : imposed vmax (0) ; vmax = vmax * coeff_vmax (1)

Parameter.name: reference_vmin_storage
Parameter.description: Estimation of minimum value : imposed vmin (0), vmin = vmin * coeff_vmin (1)

Parameter.name: scale_v
Parameter.description: Type of sampling scale : linear (0), logarithmic (1)

Parameter.name: vnorm_vmax
Parameter.description: Maximum value of velocity norm

Parameter.name: vnorm_vmin
Parameter.description: Minimum value of velocity norm

Parameter.name: vx_vmax
Parameter.description: Maximum value of velocity component in direction x

Parameter.name: vx_vmin
Parameter.description: Minimum value of velocity component in direction x

Parameter.name: vy_vmax
Parameter.description: Maximum value of velocity component in direction y

Parameter.name: vy_vmin
Parameter.description: Minimum value of velocity component in direction y

Parameter.name: vz_vmax
Parameter.description: Maximum value of velocity component in direction z

Parameter.name: vz_vmin
Parameter.description: Minimum value of velocity component in direction z

Parameter.name: coeff_tmax
Parameter.description: coeff_tmax is set as Maximum time stored / First breakthrough time

Parameter.name: coeff_tmin
Parameter.description: coeff_tmin is such that tmin = coeff_tmin*tmax, for reference_tmin_storage=1

Parameter.name: nt
Parameter.description: Sampling in time scale

Parameter.name: reference_tmax_storage
Parameter.description: Reference for the last storage time: mininmal breakthrough time * coeff_tmax (0) ; maximal breakthrough time (1) ; tmax (2)

Parameter.name: reference_tmin_storage
Parameter.description: Reference for the first storage time: tmin (0); coeff_tmin*tmax (with tmax defined as indicated by reference_tmax_storage)

Parameter.name: scale_time
Parameter.description: Type of sampling scale : linear (0), logarithmic (1)

Parameter.name: tmax
Parameter.description: Maximum time stored

Parameter.name: tmin
Parameter.description: Minimum time stored

Parameter.name: nv
Parameter.description: Sampling in velocity

Parameter.name: scale_v
Parameter.description: Type of sampling scale : linear (0), logarithmic (1)

Parameter.name: vmax
Parameter.description: Maximum value in v stored

Parameter.name: vmin
Parameter.description: Minimum value in v stored

Parameter.name: nx
Parameter.description: Sampling in direction x

Parameter.name: scale_x
Parameter.description: Type of sampling scale : linear (0), logarithmic (1)

Parameter.name: xmax
Parameter.description: Maximum position in x stored

Parameter.name: xmin
Parameter.description: Minimum position in x stored

Parameter.name: ny
Parameter.description: Sampling in direction y

Parameter.name: scale_y
Parameter.description: Type of sampling scale : linear (0), logarithmic (1)

Parameter.name: ymax
Parameter.description: Maximum position in y stored

Parameter.name: ymin
Parameter.description: Minimum position in y stored

Parameter.name: nz
Parameter.description: Sampling in direction z

Parameter.name: scale_z
Parameter.description: Type of sampling scale : linear (0), logarithmic (1)

Parameter.name: zmax
Parameter.description: Maximum position in z stored

Parameter.name: zmin
Parameter.description: Minimum position in z stored

Parameter.name: add_fracture
Parameter.description: activate or deactivate the addition of fracture over the field already generated (fracture is defined in fracture group)

Parameter.name: add_lense
Parameter.description: activate or deactivate the addition of lense over the field already generated (lense is defined in lense groups)

Parameter.name: field_type
Parameter.description: Type of field in terms of structure. ParametersGroup distribution is required for the three first options.
Parameter.possible_values: NO_CORRELATION:random non correlated field; CORRELATION:MultiGaussian correlated field; STRATIFICATION:Stratified field; STRUCTURE:Block structured field; FRACTAL:fractal and multifractal correlations; FILE:enter field from a file; INCLUSIONS:inclusions in an homogeneous field

Parameter.name: large_generation
Parameter.description: generates the permeability field in a 10 times larger grid to avoid border effects

Parameter.name: correlation_type
Parameter.description: type of correlation function

Parameter.name: generation_type
Parameter.description: REAL_SPACE: generates the correlation function, discretizes it and fourier transfrom it, FOURIER_SPACE: direct generation in fourier space

Parameter.name: periodic
Parameter.description: 1: Generation of a periodic correlation domain

Parameter.name: isotropy
Parameter.description: isotropy or anisotropy

Parameter.name: lambda_x
Parameter.description: correlation length in direction x

Parameter.name: lambda_y
Parameter.description: correlation length in direction y

Parameter.name: lambda_z
Parameter.description: correlation length in direction z

Parameter.name: lambda
Parameter.description: correlation length

Parameter.name: isotropy
Parameter.description: isotropy or anisotropy

Parameter.name: modification
Parameter.description: Modification of the correlation pattern in order to correlate more the larger values (PLUS), the smaller values (MINUS), to add fractures along the main flow direction (x) connecting the borders (F2) or not connecting the borders (F)

Parameter.name: fraction_sizex
Parameter.description: length of fracture to be added: Lx/(fraction_sizex)

Parameter.name: nb
Parameter.description: number of fractures to be added

Parameter.name: lambda_x
Parameter.description: correlation length in direction x

Parameter.name: lambda_y
Parameter.description: correlation length in direction y

Parameter.name: lambda_z
Parameter.description: correlation length in direction z

Parameter.name: lambda
Parameter.description: correlation length

Parameter.name: beta
Parameter.description: beta

Parameter.name: cutoff
Parameter.description: cutoff length, 0<val<system size

Parameter.name: power
Parameter.description: power

Parameter.name: distribution_type
Parameter.description: Type of value distribution. Each distribution is given a ParametersGroup for its parameters.
Parameter.possible_values: HOMO:constant; BINARY:binary distribution; UNIFORM:uniform distribution; NORMAL:Gaussian distribution; LOGNORMAL:Lognormal distribution; LOGUNIFORM:Loguniform distribution

Parameter.name: val1
Parameter.description: first value of the binary field

Parameter.name: val2
Parameter.description: second value of the binary field

Parameter.name: val
Parameter.description: Value of the homogeneous field

Parameter.name: lognormal_mean
Parameter.description: log-mean of the lognormal distribution

Parameter.name: lognormal_std
Parameter.description: lof-standard deviation of the lognormal distribution

Parameter.name: log_max
Parameter.description: log of ghe maximum of the loguniform distribution

Parameter.name: log_min
Parameter.description: log of ghe minimum of the loguniform distribution. Internal check that max > min

Parameter.name: mean
Parameter.description: mean of the normal distribution

Parameter.name: std
Parameter.description: standard deviation of the normal distribution

Parameter.name: val_max
Parameter.description: maximum value of the uniform distribution

Parameter.name: val_min
Parameter.description: minimum value of the uniform distribution. Internal check that max > min

Parameter.name: column_name
Parameter.description: Name of the column to load, such as permeability, K1, porosity, velocity_x1, vz...

Parameter.name: file_path
Parameter.description: file path to get core values

Parameter.name: file_type
Parameter.description: type of file

Parameter.name: ref_file_path
Parameter.description: file path to get information about external values

Parameter.name: aperture
Parameter.description: size of the aperture of the fracture (centered at the plan)

Parameter.name: dip_angle
Parameter.description: angle (in degree) between the fracture plan and the horizontal plan

Parameter.name: point_on_frac
Parameter.description: point on the fracture plan

Parameter.name: strike_angle
Parameter.description: angle (in degree) between the fracture plan and the x axis

Parameter.name: val_fracture
Parameter.description: value within the fracture

Parameter.name: K_background
Parameter.description: background permeability

Parameter.name: K_inclusions
Parameter.description: inclusions permeability

Parameter.name: lag_x
Parameter.description: characteristic distance between inclusions along x

Parameter.name: lag_y
Parameter.description: characteristic distance of the inclusions along y

Parameter.name: shape
Parameter.description: shape of the inclusions

Parameter.name: shift_x
Parameter.description: characteristic shift between inclusions along x

Parameter.name: shift_y
Parameter.description: characteristic shift of the inclusions along y

Parameter.name: size_x
Parameter.description: characteristic size of the inclusions along x

Parameter.name: size_y
Parameter.description: characteristic size of the inclusions along y

Parameter.name: multiplication_factor
Parameter.description: Multiplication factor in terms of system size

Parameter.name: position_lense
Parameter.description: point on the fracture plan; for several, separate with #

Parameter.name: size_lense
Parameter.description: size of the aperture of the fracture (centered at the plan); for several, separate with #

Parameter.name: val_lense
Parameter.description: value within the fracture; for several, separate with #

Parameter.name: analyses
Parameter.description: Type of geometrical characteristics computed on the field (classtats : neologism for classical stats <=>moments, min, max, standard deviation)
Parameter.possible_values: none; classtats; corr_length; cs4; s2_scaled; s2; cf1k; cf2k

Parameter.name: analyses_scale
Parameter.description: Scale with which the permeability field is analyzed

Parameter.name: outputs
Parameter.description: Additional large outputs like no outputs, outputs in its own file (single) or ouputs in a general file (heap)

Parameter.name: outputs_format
Parameter.description: Different output formats
Parameter.possible_values: classic; gocad; vtk; vtk_flow_line:vtk with particle number

Parameter.name: distribution_type
Parameter.description: distribution of values in the strates
Parameter.possible_values: DEFAULT:the distribution defined before; STRAT_NB:the index of the row (if HORIZONTAL) or column (if VERTICAL) or processor (if PROC)

Parameter.name: stratification_type
Parameter.description: type of stratification
Parameter.possible_values: HORIZONTAL:use distribution_type parameter for each row; VERTICAL:use distribution_type parameter for each column; PROC:use distribution_type parameter for each processor; ANNULAR:use annular parameters group; ZONES2:use zones2 parameters group; FRACTURE_HORIZONTAL:use fracture_horizontal parameters group; PARABOLIC:see source code

Parameter.name: exponent
Parameter.description: exponent of the power dependence towards the center

Parameter.name: val_fracture
Parameter.description: value within the fracture

Parameter.name: val_matrix
Parameter.description: value within the matrix

Parameter.name: direction
Parameter.description: direction in which the property varies
Parameter.possible_values: 0: X axis; 1: Y axi; 2: Z axis

Parameter.name: val_down
Parameter.description: value on the lower side

Parameter.name: val_down_definition
Parameter.description: to know which parameter defines the value on the lower side
Parameter.possible_values: VAL_DOWN: use val_down; RATIO: use val_down_ratio; EXPONENTIAL: use val_down_exponential

Parameter.name: val_down_exponential
Parameter.description: values in the lower side are defined by val_up*exp(-d/val_down_exponential), where d is the distance to the separation function

Parameter.name: val_down_ratio
Parameter.description: ratio that multiplies val_up to define the value in the lower side

Parameter.name: val_up
Parameter.description: value in the upper side

Parameter.name: separation_type
Parameter.description: topography of the separation between the 2 zones
Parameter.possible_values: CONST_MIDDLE: middle of the domain; LINEAR: use a 1D linear function along the X axis; FILE: load the separation function from a file

Parameter.name: file_path
Parameter.description: path of the topography file ; format is 1st column is i, 2nd column is k and 3rd column is topo

Parameter.name: file_type
Parameter.description: format of the topography file
Parameter.possible_values: BASIC: i k value; GRD: .grd file

Parameter.name: scale_factor
Parameter.description: factor to multiply the separation read in file (after shifting)

Parameter.name: shift
Parameter.description: shift the separation read in file, real [L]

Parameter.name: a
Parameter.description: y0+a*x

Parameter.name: y0
Parameter.description: y0+a*x

Parameter.name: Vijk
Parameter.description: values in blocs, ordered by a loop on Z blocs inside a loop on Y blocs inside a loop on X blocs; V1*V2*...*Vnv with nv = (nx+1)*(ny+1)*(nz+1)

Parameter.name: X_limits
Parameter.description: limits between blocs in X direction; X1*X2*...*Xnx in Xdirection

Parameter.name: Y_limits
Parameter.description: limits between blocs in Y direction; Y1*Y2*...*Yny in Ydirection

Parameter.name: Z_limits
Parameter.description: limits between blocs in Z direction; Z1*Z2*...*Znz in Z direction

Parameter.description: Type of geometrical characteristics computed on the field (classtats : neologism for classical stats <=>moments, min, max, standard deviation)
Parameter.possible_values: none; classtats; corr_length; cs4; s2_scaled; s2; cf1k; cf2k

Parameter.name: analyses_scale
Parameter.description: Scale with which the permeability field is analyzed

Parameter.name: outputs
Parameter.description: Additional large outputs like no outputs, outputs in its own file (single) or ouputs in a general file (heap)

Parameter.name: outputs_format
Parameter.description: Different output formats
Parameter.possible_values: classic; gocad; vtk; vtk_flow_line:vtk with particle number

Parameter.name: distribution_type
Parameter.description: distribution of values in the strates
Parameter.possible_values: DEFAULT:the distribution defined before; STRAT_NB:the index of the row (if HORIZONTAL) or column (if VERTICAL) or processor (if PROC)

Parameter.name: stratification_type
Parameter.description: type of stratification
Parameter.possible_values: HORIZONTAL:use distribution_type parameter for each row; VERTICAL:use distribution_type parameter for each column; PROC:use distribution_type parameter for each processor; ANNULAR:use annular parameters group; ZONES2:use zones2 parameters group; FRACTURE_HORIZONTAL:use fracture_horizontal parameters group; PARABOLIC:see source code

Parameter.name: exponent
Parameter.description: exponent of the power dependence towards the center

Parameter.name: val_fracture
Parameter.description: value within the fracture

Parameter.name: val_matrix
Parameter.description: value within the matrix

Parameter.name: direction
Parameter.description: direction in which the property varies
Parameter.possible_values: 0: X axis; 1: Y axi; 2: Z axis

Parameter.name: val_down
Parameter.description: value on the lower side

Parameter.name: val_down_definition
Parameter.description: to know which parameter defines the value on the lower side
Parameter.possible_values: VAL_DOWN: use val_down; RATIO: use val_down_ratio; EXPONENTIAL: use val_down_exponential

Parameter.name: val_down_exponential
Parameter.description: values in the lower side are defined by val_up*exp(-d/val_down_exponential), where d is the distance to the separation function

Parameter.name: val_down_ratio
Parameter.description: ratio that multiplies val_up to define the value in the lower side

Parameter.name: val_up
Parameter.description: value in the upper side

Parameter.name: separation_type
Parameter.description: topography of the separation between the 2 zones
Parameter.possible_values: CONST_MIDDLE: middle of the domain; LINEAR: use a 1D linear function along the X axis; FILE: load the separation function from a file

Parameter.name: file_path
Parameter.description: path of the topography file ; format is 1st column is i, 2nd column is k and 3rd column is topo

Parameter.name: file_type
Parameter.description: format of the topography file
Parameter.possible_values: BASIC: i k value; GRD: .grd file

Parameter.name: scale_factor
Parameter.description: factor to multiply the separation read in file (after shifting)

Parameter.name: shift
Parameter.description: shift the separation read in file, real [L]

Parameter.name: a
Parameter.description: y0+a*x

Parameter.name: y0
Parameter.description: y0+a*x

Parameter.name: Vijk
Parameter.description: values in blocs, ordered by a loop on Z blocs inside a loop on Y blocs inside a loop on X blocs; V1*V2*...*Vnv with nv = (nx+1)*(ny+1)*(nz+1)

Parameter.name: X_limits
Parameter.description: limits between blocs in X direction; X1*X2*...*Xnx in Xdirection

Parameter.name: Y_limits
Parameter.description: limits between blocs in Y direction; Y1*Y2*...*Yny in Ydirection

Parameter.name: Z_limits
Parameter.description: limits between blocs in Z direction; Z1*Z2*...*Znz in Z direction

Parameter.name: add_fracture
Parameter.description: activate or deactivate the addition of fracture over the field already generated (fracture is defined in fracture group)

Parameter.name: add_lense
Parameter.description: activate or deactivate the addition of lense over the field already generated (lense is defined in lense groups)

Parameter.name: field_type
Parameter.description: Type of field in terms of structure. ParametersGroup distribution is required for the three first options.
Parameter.possible_values: NO_CORRELATION:random non correlated field; CORRELATION:MultiGaussian correlated field; STRATIFICATION:Stratified field; STRUCTURE:Block structured field; FRACTAL:fractal and multifractal correlations; FILE:enter field from a file; INCLUSIONS:inclusions in an homogeneous field

Parameter.name: large_generation
Parameter.description: generates the permeability field in a 10 times larger grid to avoid border effects

Parameter.name: correlation_type
Parameter.description: type of correlation function

Parameter.name: generation_type
Parameter.description: REAL_SPACE: generates the correlation function, discretizes it and fourier transfrom it, FOURIER_SPACE: direct generation in fourier space

Parameter.name: periodic
Parameter.description: 1: Generation of a periodic correlation domain

Parameter.name: isotropy
Parameter.description: isotropy or anisotropy

Parameter.name: lambda_x
Parameter.description: correlation length in direction x

Parameter.name: lambda_y
Parameter.description: correlation length in direction y

Parameter.name: lambda_z
Parameter.description: correlation length in direction z

Parameter.name: lambda
Parameter.description: correlation length

Parameter.name: isotropy
Parameter.description: isotropy or anisotropy

Parameter.name: modification
Parameter.description: Modification of the correlation pattern in order to correlate more the larger values (PLUS), the smaller values (MINUS), to add fractures along the main flow direction (x) connecting the borders (F2) or not connecting the borders (F)

Parameter.name: fraction_sizex
Parameter.description: length of fracture to be added: Lx/(fraction_sizex)

Parameter.name: nb
Parameter.description: number of fractures to be added

Parameter.name: lambda_x
Parameter.description: correlation length in direction x

Parameter.name: lambda_y
Parameter.description: correlation length in direction y

Parameter.name: lambda_z
Parameter.description: correlation length in direction z

Parameter.name: lambda
Parameter.description: correlation length

Parameter.name: beta
Parameter.description: beta

Parameter.name: cutoff
Parameter.description: cutoff length, 0<val<system size

Parameter.name: power
Parameter.description: power

Parameter.name: distribution_type
Parameter.description: Type of value distribution. Each distribution is given a ParametersGroup for its parameters.
Parameter.possible_values: HOMO:constant; BINARY:binary distribution; UNIFORM:uniform distribution; NORMAL:Gaussian distribution; LOGNORMAL:Lognormal distribution; LOGUNIFORM:Loguniform distribution

Parameter.name: val1
Parameter.description: first value of the binary field

Parameter.name: val2
Parameter.description: second value of the binary field

Parameter.name: val
Parameter.description: Value of the homogeneous field

Parameter.name: lognormal_mean
Parameter.description: log-mean of the lognormal distribution

Parameter.name: lognormal_std
Parameter.description: lof-standard deviation of the lognormal distribution

Parameter.name: log_max
Parameter.description: log of ghe maximum of the loguniform distribution

Parameter.name: log_min
Parameter.description: log of ghe minimum of the loguniform distribution. Internal check that max > min

Parameter.name: mean
Parameter.description: mean of the normal distribution

Parameter.name: std
Parameter.description: standard deviation of the normal distribution

Parameter.name: val_max
Parameter.description: maximum value of the uniform distribution

Parameter.name: val_min
Parameter.description: minimum value of the uniform distribution. Internal check that max > min

Parameter.name: column_name
Parameter.description: Name of the column to load, such as permeability, K1, porosity, velocity_x1, vz...

Parameter.name: file_path
Parameter.description: file path to get core values

Parameter.name: file_type
Parameter.description: type of file

Parameter.name: ref_file_path
Parameter.description: file path to get information about external values

Parameter.name: aperture
Parameter.description: size of the aperture of the fracture (centered at the plan)

Parameter.name: dip_angle
Parameter.description: angle (in degree) between the fracture plan and the horizontal plan

Parameter.name: point_on_frac
Parameter.description: point on the fracture plan

Parameter.name: strike_angle
Parameter.description: angle (in degree) between the fracture plan and the x axis

Parameter.name: val_fracture
Parameter.description: value within the fracture

Parameter.name: K_background
Parameter.description: background permeability

Parameter.name: K_inclusions
Parameter.description: inclusions permeability

Parameter.name: lag_x
Parameter.description: characteristic distance between inclusions along x

Parameter.name: lag_y
Parameter.description: characteristic distance of the inclusions along y

Parameter.name: shape
Parameter.description: shape of the inclusions

Parameter.name: shift_x
Parameter.description: characteristic shift between inclusions along x

Parameter.name: shift_y
Parameter.description: characteristic shift of the inclusions along y

Parameter.name: size_x
Parameter.description: characteristic size of the inclusions along x

Parameter.name: size_y
Parameter.description: characteristic size of the inclusions along y

Parameter.name: multiplication_factor
Parameter.description: Multiplication factor in terms of system size

Parameter.name: position_lense
Parameter.description: point on the fracture plan; for several, separate with #

Parameter.name: size_lense
Parameter.description: size of the aperture of the fracture (centered at the plan); for several, separate with #

Parameter.name: val_lense
Parameter.description: value within the fracture; for several, separate with #
